# galaxy_role (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `grant_to_creating_role` (Boolean) Grant to creating role (read only)
- `role_name` (String) Role name (read only)

### Optional

- `role_description` (String) Role description (read only)

### Read-Only

- `all_roles` (Attributes List) All directly granted and inherited roles (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--all_roles))
- `created_on` (String) Creation date (read only)
- `directly_granted_roles` (Attributes List) Directly granted roles (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--directly_granted_roles))
- `modified_on` (String) Modified date (read only)
- `owning_role_id` (String) Owning role (read only)
- `role_id` (String) Role ID (read only)

### Nested Schema for `all_roles`

Read-Only:

- `admin_option` (Boolean) Admin option
- `principal` (Attributes) Principal (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--all_roles--principal))
- `role_id` (String) Role ID
- `role_name` (String) Role name

### Nested Schema for `all_roles.principal`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Principal ID
- `type` (String) Principal type
